Market Trends: Digital transformation in education, remote access to resources, affordability focus
Investor Sentiment: Investors support peer-to-peer platforms and ed-tech ideas, especially with scalable impact
Funding Options: Startup India Seed Fund, university incubators, angel investors focused on ed-tech
Legal Info: Follow IT Act, setup Private Limited firm, include rental policy terms
Govt Schemes: Avail benefits under Startup India, MSME registration, and AICTE Incubation grants
